metadata.title: CVE-2020-13152 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - low
metadata.description: A remote user can create a specially crafted M3U file, media playlist filethat when loaded by the target user, will trigger a memory leak, wherebyAmarok 2.8.0 continue to waste resources over time, eventually allowsattackers to cause a denial of service.

criterions.comment: amarok: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
